column3: Sorry I meant to refer to commit 2b1f6f9ccf36f1e0a2c9d99154e1642f796d7c2b. update_ancestor_state : int modifySigOps was changed to int64_t modifySigOpsCost

utACK 203a4aa31eee402755f7156593228ab55407cc47, though as @Leviathn points out, this is not "trivial" (by our definition, the project generally considers "trivial" to only include comment and sometimes string changes, never code changes).

Updated title to [Mempool] - sorry I misread the guidelines :)\n\n> Notably, refactors (change of function arguments and code reorganization) and changes in behavior should not be marked as trivial.
